text: "Tougher Than the Rest" is a 1988 song by Bruce Springsteen. It was taken from his eighth studio album Tunnel of Love and was released as a single in Europe but not in the United States. It went to number 13 in the United Kingdom and Italy, number 25 in Germany, number 35 in Australia, number 10 in Irelana and number 11 in Austria. title: Tougher Than the Rest
